news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Loamist, a climate-tech startup, launched its Biomass Explorer in early 2024, following a $1M pre-seed financing round supported by leading climate investors.

overview_description.description: Loamist operates as a climate-tech startup.

properties.growth_insight_description: Loamist may be growing as it has recently launched with a significant funding round of one million dollars, indicating investor confidence and financial backing to support its operations. The startup is positioned in the climate-tech sector, which aligns with the growing emphasis on sustainable and renewable energy solutions, suggesting a favorable market environment for its innovative biomass solutions. Furthermore, the mention of Loamist pioneering a new era in the bioeconomy hints at its active role in the industry and potential for scaling its business.

about_short_description.short_description: Loamist operates as a climate-tech startup.

product.name: Explore Biomass Availability
product.description: Provides a comprehensive overview of available waste biomass resources for climatetech companies.

product.name: Generate Reports
product.description: A tool for creating detailed analyses and reports on biomass resources and their potential uses.

product.name: Create your Own Directory
product.description: An integrated system for tracking and organizing feedstock contacts and assets, with mapping capabilities.

product.name: Carbon Chain of Custody
product.description: A system for tracking and validating the supply chain of biomass to ensure sustainability and carbon credit generation.
